AbstractFixedGameObject - Class in model
Abstraction for all game objects which are located in a fixed position.
AbstractFixedGameObject(Color, Location2D, Shape) - Constructor for class model.AbstractFixedGameObject
Basic constructor for all game objects; all game objects have a color and location.
AbstractGameException - Exception in controller
Abstract super class for all game exceptions.

Constructs the exception with the message.
AbstractGameObject - Class in model
Abstraction for all game objects.

AbstractGameWorldProxy - Class in model

AbstractMovableGameObject - Class in model
Abstraction for all game objects which can be moved.
AbstractMovableGameObject(Color, Location2D, Shape, int, int) - Constructor for class model.AbstractMovableGameObject
In addition to the data taken by the super AbstractGameObject.AbstractGameObject(Color, Location2D, Shape) class, this constructor takes the speed and heading of the movable object.
